text: He hamro palanakarta! Timile uniharula'i sadhaim basako nimti svargaharuma pravesa gara'u, jasako timile uniharusita vaca gareka chau, ra uniharuka ba'ubaje ra uniharuka patniharu ra unaka santatiharumadhye jo asala acaranavala chan uniharula'i pani. Nihsandeha timi adhipatyasali atyanta tatvadarsi hau
